meanings.definition: A square or rectangular piece of fabric worn around the shoulders or head.
meanings.sent1: She draped a colorful shawl around her shoulders to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The elegant lady wore a silk shawl to a fancy event.
meanings.sent3: The shawl danced in the wind as if it had a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her shawl was a comforting hug on a chilly evening.
meanings.sent5: The shawl's soft touch brought a sense of coziness.

meanings.definition: To wrap oneself in a shawl for warmth or fashion.
meanings.sent1: She shawls herself tightly before stepping out into the cold.
meanings.sent2: In winter, she always shawls up in her favorite knitted wrap.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally shawled himself with the tablecloth instead of a towel.
meanings.sent4: She shawls her worries away with the embrace of the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The way she shawls herself exudes elegance and grace.
